articles.title: Indonesia’s Sumatra sees 14-fold spike in fire hotspots over 1.5 weeks, as Malaysia warns of haze
articles.summary:

📢 Indonesia’s Sumatra sees 14-fold spike in fire hotspots over 1.5 weeks, as Malay...
articles.content: Hotspots are satellite images with high infrared intensity, indicating sources of high heat, such as forest and land fires. This is up from 38 hotspots reported on Jul 12. articles.content: The Singapore Police Force (SPF) also said that investigations were ongoing into the unnatural death of Ms Jane Lee, Sumo Salad's owner. "On that day, she was supposed to leave work early, but she deliberately stayed back
